meanings.definition: A female partner in a romantic relationship.
meanings.sent1: My girlfriend and I went on a date last night.
meanings.sent2: She is my girlfriend, and I love spending time with her.
meanings.sent3: My girlfriend always makes me laugh with her silly jokes.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lights up the room like a girlfriend's love.
meanings.sent5: I feel so lucky to have such a caring girlfriend by my side.

meanings.sent1: I consider her my best girlfriend because we share everything.
meanings.sent2: My girlfriend and I have known each other since kindergarten.
meanings.sent3: My girlfriend and I love going shopping together.
meanings.sent4: She is a true girlfriend, always there to support me.
meanings.sent5: Having a loyal girlfriend like her makes life more fun.
